resources.string: Find your UTA bestie! Help make your college experience an amazing one.
To help UTA students (mainly commuters) to make new friends based on their interests.

Mavties are lifelong friends who gather for brunches, book clubs, hangouts, and obviously to study. We motivate and inspire each other and we are happier and healthier in sharing our personal experiences.
We value: Community Building, Loyalty, Friendship, Empathy, Studying, and Having Fun!
The Goal: Make real connections, online or in-person.
